resources.string: Passionate to create simple yet innovative design and technology to deliver amazing user experience.

I make/discover things and then make them better. Noobie for the industry but with attitude of a pro. Thirst for perfection , will reflect in my work. Hunger for new tech and obsession to apply it in my work. Ready to Brainstorm anytime.
